Translations.Text: Az ci ciz (hamdigarro) mepursand
Az on xaʙari ʙuzurg, (qijomat)
ki dar on ixtilof mekunand
Ore, ʙa zudi xohad donist
Boz ham, ore, ʙa zudi xohand donist
Ojo Mo zaminrro ʙistare nasoxtem
Va kuhhoro mexhoe
Va sumoro cuft-cuft ofaridem
Va xoʙatonro ossisaton gardonidem
Va saʙro pusisaton qaror dodem
Va ruzro vaqti talaʙi ma'isat. (kasʙ)
Va ʙar ʙoloi saraton haft osmoni ustuvor ʙino kardem
Va caroƣe ravsan ofaridem. (oftoʙ)
Az aʙrhoi ʙoronzoj oʙe farovon nozil kardem
to ʙo on donavu naʙot ʙirujonem
va ʙustonhoi anʙuh (serdaraxt)
Alʙatta ruzi dovari ruzest mu'ajjan
Ruze, ki dar sur damida savad, va sumo guruhguruh ʙijoed
Osmon sikofta savad va har sikof dare ʙosad
Va kuhho ravon savand va saroʙ gardand
Cahannam dar intizor ʙosad
Sarkasonro ʙozgastangohest
Zamone daroz dar on co ʙosand
Na xunuki casandu na oʙ
faqat oʙi cusonu xunu cirk. (nusand)
In cazoest muvofiqi kirdor
Zero onon ʙa ruzi hisoʙ umed nadostand
Va ojoti Moro ʙa saxti duruƣ meʙarovardand
Va Mo hama cizro dar, kitoʙe sumora kardaem
Pas ʙicased, ki faqat ʙar azoʙi sumo xohem afzud
Parhezgoronro coest dar amon az har oseʙ
ʙustonhovu tokistonho
va duxtarone hamsol ʙo pistonhoi ʙaromada
va comhoi pur
Na suxani ʙehuda sunavand va na duruƣ
va in mukofotest kofi az coniʙi Parvardigorat—
Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. On Xudoi rahmon, ki kasro ʙa U joroi xitoʙ naʙosad
ruze, ki ruh va faristagon ʙa saf meistand va kas suxan namegujad, ƣajri on ki Xudoi rahmon ʙa u ruxsat dihad, va u suxan ʙa savoʙ gujad
On ruz ruzest omadani. Pas har ki xohad ʙa sui Parvardigoras ʙozgardad
Mo sumoro az azoʙe nazdik metarsonem: ruze, ki odami har ciro pesopes firistodaast, menigarad va kofir megujad: «Ej kos, man xok meʙudam!»
Savgand ʙa faristagone, ki conhoro (conhoi kofironro) ʙa saxti megirand
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki conhoro (conhoi mu'minonro) ʙa osoni megirand
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki sinovarand
va savgand, ʙa faristagone, ki ʙar jakdigar pesi megirand (dar ʙolo ʙurdani conhoi mu'minon)
va savgand ʙa onho, ki tadʙiri korho mekunand
ki on ruz, ki naxustin nafxai qijomat (damidani dar sur) zaminro ʙilarzonad
va nafxai duvvum az pasi on ʙijojad
dar on ruz dilhoe dar haros ʙosand
va nisoni xusu' (xori) dar didagon namojon
Megujand: «Ojo mo ʙa holati naxustin ʙozmegardem
on goh ki ustuxonhoe pusida ʙudem?»
Gujand: «In ʙozgasti mo ʙozgastest zijonovar
Faqat in ast, ki tanho jak ʙong ʙarmeojad
va onho xudro dar on sahro xohand joft
Ojo dostoni Muso ʙa tu rasidaast
On goh ki Parvardigoras uro dar vodii muqaddasi Tuvo nido dod
«Ba sui Fir'avn ʙirav, ki az had guzastaast
Bigu: «Ojo turo raƣʙate hast, ki pokiza savi
va man turo ʙa Parvardigorat roh ʙinamojam va tu ʙitarsi (az U)?»
Pas on ojati ʙuzurgro ʙa u nison dod
Va u duruƣ ʙarovardu nofarmoni kard
Sipas pust gardondu mesitoft
Pas hamaro cam' kard va nido dod
va guft: «Man Parvardigori ʙartari sumo hastam!»
Xudojas ʙa aozʙi oxiratu dunjo giriftor kard
Dar in iʙratest ʙaroi, kase, ki metarsad
Ojo sumo ʙa ofarinis saxttared, jo in osmone, ki U ʙino kardaast
Saqfasro ʙarafrost va durust kard
saʙasro torik kard va rusnoijasro oskor soxt
va pas az on zaminro ʙigusturd (pahn kard)
va az on oʙ ʙerun ovard va carogohho padid ovard
va kuhhoro ustuvor gardonid
ʙaroi ʙahragirii sumo va corpojonaton
Cun on hodisai ʙuzurg darrasad
ruze, ki odami hamai amalhoi xudro ʙa jod ovarad
va cahannamro ʙa har ki meʙinad nison dihand
Pas har kj az had guzasta ʙosad (dar kufru isjon)
va zindagii incahonro ixtijor karda ʙosad
cahannam cojgohi ust
Ammo har kas, ki az istodan dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoras tarsida va nafsro az havo (va havas) ʙozdosta ʙosad
ʙihist cojgohi ust
Turo az qijomat mepursand, ki ci vaqt voqe' savad
Az jod kardani (ilmi) on turo ci kor ast
Intihoi ilmi on nazdi Parvardigori tust
Faqat va faqat tu kasonero, ki az on ruz ʙitarsand, ʙim medihi
Cun onro ʙuʙinand, pindorand dar in cahon faqat jak somgoh jo costgoh istodaand
Rujro turs kard va sar ʙargardonid
cun on noʙino ʙa nazdas omad
Va tu ci doni, sojad, ki u pokiza savad
jo pand girad va pandi tu foidaas kunad
Ammo on ki u tavongar ast
tu rui xud ʙa u mekuni
va agar ham pok nagardad, cize ʙar zijoni tu nest
Va ammo on, ki sitoʙon ʙa nazdi tu meojad
va metarsad, (az xudo)
tu az u ʙa digare ruj, meori
Ore, in Qur'on pandest
pas har ki xohad, az on pand girad
Dar sahifahoe giromi
ʙalandqadru pokiza
ʙa dasti kotiʙone
ʙuzurgvoru nekukor
Marg ʙar odami ʙod, ki ci nosipos (nosukr) ast
Uro az ci ofaridaast
Az nutfae ofarid va ʙa andoza muajjan kard
sipas rohasro oson soxt
On goh ʙimirondas va dar gur kard
Va on goh, ki xohad, zindaas sozad
Na ki hanuz on ciro ʙa u farmon doda ʙud, ʙa coj najovardaast
Pas odami ʙa ta'omi xud ʙingarad
Mo ʙoronro furu ʙoridem, ʙoridani
va zaminro sikoftem, sikoftani
va dar on donaho rujonidem
va toku saʙzavot
va zajtunu naxl (daraxti xurmo)
va ʙoƣhoi purdaraxt
va mevavu alaf
to sumovu corpojonaton ʙahra ʙared
Cun ʙongi qijomat ʙarojad
ruze, ki odami az ʙarodaras megurezad
va az modarasu padaras
va az zanasu farzandonas
Har kasro dar ruz korest, ki ʙa xud masƣulas dorad
Cehrahoe dar on ruz duraxsonand
xandonandu sodonand
Va cehrahoe dar on ruz ƣuʙoroludand
dar sijohi furu raftaand
Inho kofironu focironand (ʙadkoron)
Cun xursed ʙefuruƣ (xira) savad
va cun sitoragon furu rezand
va cun kuhho az coi xud ʙeco ʙisavand
va cun suturoni homila ʙa holi xud guzosta savand
va cun convaroni vahsi cam' ovarda savand
va cun darjoho otas girand
va cun ruhho ʙo tanho jakcoja gardgand
va cun az duxtari zinda ʙa gur suda pursida savad, ki
ʙa ci gunohe kusta sudaast
va cun sahifaho ʙoz savand
va cun osmon az coi xud kanda savad
va cun cahannam afruxta gardad
va cun ʙihistro pes ovarand
har kas ʙidonad, ki ci hozir ovardaast
Savgand ʙa sitoragoni ʙozgardanda
sajrkunandai ƣojʙsavanda
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun torik savad
va savgand ʙa suʙh cun ʙidamad
ki in suxani rasule ʙuzurgvor (Ciʙril (a)) ast
nerumand, dar nazdi Xudovandi ars sohiʙoʙru
on co (dar nazdi Xudo) farmonravoi ʙovarinokast
Va hamsuhʙati sumo devona nest
Alʙatta Uro (Ciʙrilro) dar ufuqi ravsan didaast
Va on ciro az ƣajʙ ʙa u gujand, dareƣ namedorad
Va on suxan suxani sajtoni racim nest
Pas ʙa kuco meraved
In kitoʙ pandest ʙaroi cahonijon
ʙaroi har kas az sumo, ki ʙixohad ʙa rohi rost aftad
Va sumo namexohed, ƣajri on ciro, ki Parvardigori cahonijon xosta ʙosad
On goh, ki osmon ʙisikofad
va on goh ki sitoraton parokanda savand
va on goh, ki darjoho ʙa ham ʙipajvandand
va on goh, ki qaʙrho zeru zaʙar (sikofta) gardaid
har kas medonad, ci ciz pesopes firistoda va ci ciz ʙar coj guzostaast
Ej odami, ci ciz turo ʙa Parvardigori karimat maƣrur kardaast? (fireftaast)
On ki turo ʙijofarid, va a'zojat durust kard va turo mu'tadil qomat kard
Va ʙa har surate, ki xost, a'zoi turo ʙa ham andoxt (tarkiʙ dod)
Ne, ne sumo ruzi cazoro duruƣ mehisoʙed
Hol on ki ʙar sumo muhofizone (faristagone) voʙasta sudaand
kotiʙone ʙuzurgvor
medonand, ki sumo ci mekuned
Alʙatta nekukoron dar ne'matand
va gunohkoron dar cahannam
Dar ruzi sumor (qijomat) ʙa cahannam darojand
va az on ƣoiʙ nasavand
Tu ci doni, ki ruzi sumor cist
Boz ham tu ci doni, ki ruzi sumor cist
Ruzest, ki kase ʙaroi kasi digar hec kore natavanad kard va dar on ruz farmon farmoni Xudo ʙosad
Voj ʙar kamfuruson
onon, ki cun az mardum kajl (pajmona) mesitonand, onro pur mekunand
va cun ʙaroi mardum mepajmojand jo ʙarmekasand, az on kam mekunand
Ojo inho namedonand, ki zinda mesavand
dar on ruzi ʙuzurg
Ruze, ki mardum ʙa pesgohi Parvardigori cahonijon meistand
Haqqo, ki alʙatta a'moli ʙadkoron navistasuda dar siccin ast
Tu ci medoni, ki siccin cist
Kitoʙest navista
Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon (duruƣʙarorandagon)
onon, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ mehisoʙand
Va on ruzro faqat az had guzarandai gunohkor duruƣ mehisoʙad
Cun ojoti Mo ʙar u xonda sud, guft: «Afsonahoi pesinijon ast!»
Haqqo, ki korhoe, ki karda ʙudand, ʙar dilhoson (ƣoliʙ suda) zang ʙastaast
Haqqo, ki dar on ruz az (didori) Parvardigorason mahcuʙ (mahrum) ʙosand
Pas onho ʙa cahannam darojand
Va onhoro gujand: «In ast on ci duruƣas mesumurded!»
Haqqo, ki amalhoi nekon dar illijin maktuʙ ast
Va tu ci medoni, ki illijin cist
Kitoʙest navista
Ki muqarraʙoni (nazdiksudagoni) Xudo dar on menigarand
Alʙatta nekon dar ne'matand
ʙar taxtho nisasta va nazora mekunand
Bar cehrahoson tarovati ne'matro ʙisinosi
Az saroʙe xolis, ki ʙar sari on muhr nihodaand, seroʙ mesavand
Muhri on az musk ast va pesdasti kunandagon dar on ʙar jakdigar pesdasti kunand
Omezai on tasnim ast, (ja'ne ʙotasnim omexta)
casmaest, ki muqarraʙoni (nazdikoni dargohi) Xudo az on meosomand
Gunohkoron ʙa mu'minon mexandidand
Va cun ʙar onho meguzastand, ʙa casmu aʙru isora mekardand (ʙo nijati masxara)
va cun nazdi kasonason ʙozmegastand, sodmona ʙozmegastand
Va cun ononro medidand, meguftand, ki inho gumrohand
Va hol on ki ononro ʙa nigahʙonivu muhofizati amalhoi mu'minon nafiristoda ʙudand
Va imruz mu'minon ʙa kofiron mexandand
ʙar taxtho takja zadaand va menigarand
Ojo kofiron ʙaroʙari amalhojason cazo joftaand
Cun osmon sikofta savad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
va cun zamin munʙasit (kasida va pahd) savad
va har ciro ki dar darun dorad, ʙerun partojad va xoli gardad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
Ej inson, tu dar rohi Parvardigorat ranci farovon mekasi, pas mukofoti onro xohi did
Har kas, ki nomaasro ʙa dasti rostas dihand
ʙa zudi oson az u hisoʙ kunand
va sodmon nazdi kasonas ʙozgardad
Ammo har kas, ki nomaas az pusti sar doda savad
ʙa zudi, ki ʙigujad: «Voj ʙar man, ki halok sudam»
Va ʙa otasi afruxta darojad
U dar dunjo nazdi kasonas sodmon zista ʙud
Va mepindost, ki hargiz ʙoznaxohad gast
Ore, Parvardigoras uro medidaast
Pas ʙa safaq savgand mexuram
va savgand ʙa saʙu har ciro furu pusad
va savgand ʙa moh, cun purra savad
ki ʙa hole ʙa'd az holi digar xohed rasid
Ci mesavad onhoro, ki imon nameovarand
Va cun Qur'on ʙar onho xonda savad, sacda namekunand? (Sacda)
Balki kofiron takziʙ mekunand (duruƣ meʙarorand)
Va Xudo ʙa on ci dar dil dorand, ogoh ast
Pas ononro ʙa azoʙe dardovar xusxaʙar deh
ƣajri onon, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ki mukofotasonro pojone nest
Qasam ʙa osmon, ki dorandai ʙurchost
va qasam ʙa ruzi mav'ud
va qasam ʙa sohididihanda va on ci ʙa on sohidi dihand
ki sohiʙoni uhdud ʙa halokat rasidand
Otase afruxta az hezumho
on goh ki ʙar kanori on otas nisasta ʙudand
va ʙar on ci ʙar sari mu'minon meovarand, sohid ʙudand
Va hec ajʙe dar onho najoftand, cuz on ki ʙa Xudoi ƣoliʙi loiqi sitois imon ovarda ʙudand
on Xudoe, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust va ʙar har cize nozir ast
Alʙatta onon, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca kardand va tavʙa nakardand, azoʙi cahannam va azoʙi otas ʙaroi onhost
Baroi kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙihisthoest, ki dar on nahrho corist va on komjoʙii ʙuzurgest
Ba azoʙ giriftani Parvardigori tu saxt ast
Ust, ki naxust meofarinad va pas az marg zinda mesozad
U ʙaxsojandavu dustdoranda ast
Ust sohiʙi arsi ʙuzurg
Har ciro iroda kunad, ʙa ancom merasonad
Ojo dostoni laskarhoro sunidai
Laskarhoi Fir'avnu qavmi Samud
Ore, onon, ki rohi kufr pes giriftaand, hamcunon dar duruƣʙarori hastand
va Xudo az hama su ʙar onho ihota dorad
Bale, in Qur'oni macid ast
dar lavhi mahfuz
Savgand ʙa osmonu ʙa on ci dar saʙ ojad
Va tu ci doni, ki on ci dar saʙ ojad, cist
Sitoraest duraxsanda
Hec kas nest, ki ʙar u nigahʙone naʙosad
Pas odami ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarisa sudaast
Az oʙe cahanda ofarida sudaast
ki az mijoni pustu sina ʙerun meojad
Xudo ʙa ʙozgardonidani u tavonost
ruze, ki rozho (sirho) oskor mesavand
Uro na quvvatest, va na jovare
Qasam ʙa osmoni ʙozʙoranda
Qasam ʙa zamini rujoni sikofxurda, (ʙaroi gijoh)
ki in kitoʙ haqro az ʙotil cudo kunad
va suxani hazl nest
Onon hilae meandesand
va Man ham hilae meandesam
Pas kofironro muhlat deh andak muhlatason deh
Nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgi xudro ʙa poki jod kun
on ki ofarid va durustandom kard
Va on ki andoza mu'ajjan kard. Sipas roh namud
Va on ki carogohhoro rujonid
sipas xusku sijoh gardonid
Ba zudi ʙaroi tu ʙixonem, maʙod, ki faromus kuni
ƣajri on ci Xudo ʙixohad. Ust, ki oskorovu nihonro medonad
Va turo ʙa dini oson tavfiq dihem
Agar pand, dodanat sud kunad, pand deh
On ki metarsad, pand megirad
Va ʙadʙaxt az on duri megirad
on ki ʙa otasi ʙuzurgi cahannam daraftad
va dar on co na ʙimirad va na zinda ʙosad
Alʙatta pokon nacot joftand
onon, ki nomi Parvardigori xudro ʙar zaʙon ovardand va namoz guzoridand
Ore, sumo zindagii in cahonro ixtijor mekuned
hol on ki oxirat ʙehtaru pojandatar ast
In suxan dar sahifahoi naxustin ast
sahifahoi Iʙrohimu Muso
Ojo dostoni ƣosija ʙa tu rasidaast
Dar on ruz vahsat dar cehraho padidor ast
taloskardavu rancdida
dar otasi suzon daraftand
az on casmai ʙisjor garm oʙason dihand
ta'ome ƣajri xor nadorand
ki na farʙeh mekunad va na daf'i gurusnagi
Va dar on ruz cehrahoe toza ʙosand
az kori xud xusnud
dar ʙihiste olimaqom
ki dar on suxani ʙehuda nasnavi
va dar on casmasorho ravon ʙosad
va taxthoe ʙaland zada
va kuzahoe nihoda
va ʙolishoe dar kanori ham cida
va farshoe pahn karda
Ojo ʙa sutur namenigarand, ki ci guna ofarida suda
Va ʙa osmon, ki ci guna ʙardostasuda
Va ʙa kuhho, ki ci guna ʙaland kasidasuda
Va ʙa zamin, ki ci son gusturda suda
Pas pand deh ki tu panddihandae hasti
Tu ʙar onon farmonravo nesti
Magar on kas ki rujgardon sud va kofir sud
Pas Xudojas ʙa azoʙi ʙuzurgtar azoʙ mekunad
Alʙatta ʙozgastason ʙa sui Most
Sipas hisoʙason ʙo Most
Savgand ʙa sapedai suʙh
va savgand ʙa saʙhoi dahgona (dah saʙi Zulhicca)
va savgand ʙa cuftu toq
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun ruj ʙa raftan nihad
Ojo dar in zikrkardasudaho xiradmandro savgandhoi kofist
Ojo nadidai, ki Parvardigori tu ʙo qavmi Od ci kard
Bo Iram, ki sutunho dost
Va monandi on dar hec sahre ofarida nasuda ʙud
Va qavmi Samud, ki dar on vodi sangro meʙuridand
Va qavmi Fir'avn, on dorandai mexho
onho dar sahrho az had tacovuz kardand
va dar onho ʙisjor fasod kardand
Va Parvardigori tu tozijonai azoʙro ʙar sarason furud ovard
Zero Parvardigorat dar kamingoh ast
Ammo odami, cuta Parvardigoras ʙijozmojad va giromias dorad va ne'matas dihad, megujad: «Parvardigori man maro giromi dost»
Va cun ʙijozmojadas va rizq ʙar u tang girad, megujad: «Parvardigori man maro xor soxt»
Na cunon ast. Sumo jatimro giromi namedored
va jakdigarro ʙa ta'om dodani miskis tarƣiʙ namekuned
va merosro harisona mexured
va molro farovon dust dored
Ore, cun zamin sikasta savad va sikasta savad
va amri Parvardigori tu faro rasad va faristagon saf dar saf savand
va dar on ruz cahannamro hozir orand, odami pand girad. Va ci coi pand giriftan ʙosad
Megujad: «Ej kos ki ʙaroi hajoti covidonai xud pesopes cize mefiristodam»
Dar on ruz kase cun azoʙi u azoʙ nakunad
va monandi zanciri u ʙa zancir nakasad
Ej ruhi oromisjofta
xusnudu pisandida ʙa sui Parvardigorat ʙozgard
va dar zumrai ʙandagoni Man doxil sav
va ʙa ʙihisti Man daroj
Qasam ʙa in sahr! (Makka)
Va tu dar in sahr halol xohi sud
Va qasam ʙa padaru farzandoni u
ki odamiro, dar rancu mehnat ʙijofaridaem
Ojo mepindorad, ki kas ʙar u qodir nagardad
Megujad: «Mole farovonro xarc kardam!»
Ojo mepindorad, ki kase uro nadidaast
Ojo ʙaroi u du casm najofaridaem
Va jak zaʙonu du laʙ
Va du roh ʙa u dalolat nakardem
Va u dar on guzargohi saxt qadam nanihod
Va tu ci doni, ki guzargohi saxt cist
Ozod kardani ʙanda ast
jo ta'om dodan dar ruzi qahti
xosa ʙa jatime, ki xesovand ʙosad
jo ʙa miskine xoknisin (muhtoc)
Ba'd, az on az kasone ʙosad, ki imon ovardaand va jakdigarro ʙa saʙr vasijat kardaandu ʙa safqat
Inho ahli sa'odatand
Va kasone, ki ʙa ojoti Mo kofirand, ahli saqovatand (ʙadʙaxtijand)
Nasiʙi onhost otase, ki az har su saras pusidaast
Savgand ʙa oftoʙ va ravsanias ʙa hangomi cost
va savgand ʙa moh cun az pai on ʙarojad
va savgand, ʙa ruz, cun dunjoro ravsan kunad
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun ruzro ʙipusad
va savgand ʙa osmonu on ki onro ʙino karda
va savgand ʙa zaminu on ki onro ʙigusturda
va savgand, ʙa nafsu on ki nekujas ʙijofarida
sipas ʙadihovu parhezgorihojasro ʙa u ilhom karda
ki har ki dar pokii nafs kusid, nacot joft
va har ki dar palidias kusid, zijon kard
Qavmi Samud az rui sarkasi duruƣ ʙarovardand
On goh ki ʙadʙaxttarinason ʙarxost
Pajomʙari Xudo ʙa onho guft, ki modasuturi Xudrro ʙo navʙati oʙi uro ʙiguzored
Uro duruƣ ʙarovardand va suturro kustand. Pas Parvardigorasoi ʙa saʙaʙi gunohasod ʙar sarason azoʙ ovard va ʙo xok jakson soxt
Va U az oqiʙati on nametarsad
Savgand ʙa saʙ, on goh ki cahonro ʙo torikias ʙipusad
va savgand ʙa ruz, on goh ki oskor savad
va savgand, ʙa on ki naru modaro ʙijofarid
ki hosili kusishoi sumo gunogun ast
Ammo kase, ki ʙaxsoisu parhezgori kard
va on ʙehtarinro tasdiq kard (kalimai tajiʙaro)
pas ʙaroi ʙihist omodaas mekunem
Ammo on kas ki ʙaxilivu ʙeehtijoci kard
va on ʙehtarinro takziʙ kard (duruƣ ʙarovard)
uro ʙaroi duzax omoda mesozem
Va cun halokas darrasad, doroijas ʙa holas foida naʙaxsad
Va on ci ʙar Most, rohnamoist
Va az oni Most on cahonu in cahon
Pas sumoro az otase, ki zaʙona mezanad, metarsonam
cuz ahli ʙadʙaxti ʙa on darnajaftad
on ki duruƣ ʙarovard va rujgardon sud
Va parhezgortarin mardumro az on dur dorand
on ki moli xud meʙaxsojad va poki mecujad
Va hec kasro ʙar (gardani) u haqqe naʙosad, ki aknun mukofot xohad
Ƣajri custani xusnudii Parvardigori ʙalandmartaʙai xud
Va ʙa zudi xusnud savad
Savgand ʙa vaqti cost
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun ʙipusad (ʙo torikii xud atrofro)
ki Parvardigorat turo tark nakarda va dusman ham nagiriftaast
Alʙatta oxirat ʙaroi tu ʙehtar az dunjost
Ba zudi Parvardigorat turo ato xohad dod, to xusnud savi
Ojo turo jatim najoft va panohat nadod
Va turo gumgasta joft va hidojatat kard
Va turo darves joft va tavongarat gardonid
Pas jatimro majozor
va gadoro maron
va az ne'mati Parvardigorat suxan ʙiguj
Ojo sinaatro ʙarojat nakusodem
Va ʙori garonatro az pustat ʙarnadostem
Bore, ki ʙar pusti tu sangini mekard
Ojo turo ʙalandovoza nasoxtem
Pas az pai dusvori osonist
Alʙatta az pai dusvori osonist
Cun az kor foriƣ savi, ʙa iʙodat kus
va ʙa Parvardigorat raƣʙat namo
Savgand ʙa anciru zajtun
savgand ʙa Turi muʙorak
savgand ʙa in sahri emin
ki mo odamiro dar nekutarin surate ʙijofaridem
On goh uro furutar az hamai furutaron gardonidem, (pasttar az hamai pastho)
ƣajri onon, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ki muzde ʙepojon dorand
Pas cist, ki ʙo in hol turo ʙa duruƣ sumoridani qijomat vomedorad
Ojo Xudo dovartarini dovaron nest
Bixon ʙa nomi Parvardigorat, ki ʙijofarid
odamiro az laxtai xune ʙijofarid
Bixon! Va Parvardigori tu arcmandtarin ast
Xudoe, ki ʙa vositai qalam omuzis dod
ʙa odami on ciro, ki namedonist, ʙijomuxt
Haqqo, ki odami az had meguzarad
har goh ki xestanro tavongar ʙinad
Alʙatta ʙozgast ʙa sui Parvardigori tust
Ojo didi on kasro, ki, man' mekunad
ʙandaero, ki namoz mexonad
Kani ʙigu, agar on mard ʙar tariqi hidojat ʙosad
Jo ʙa parhezgori farmon dihad
Kani ʙigu, agar duruƣ ʙarorad va rujgardon savad
Ojo nadonistaast, ki Xudo meʙinad
Haqqo, ki agar ʙoznaistad, az mui pesi saras megiremu mekasem
mui pesi sari duruƣgui xatokorro
Pas hamdamoni xudro da'vat kunad
Mo niz korguzoroniduzaxro da'vat mekunem
Na, hargiz, az u pajravi makun va sacda kunu ʙa Xudo nazdik sav! (Sacda)
Mo dar saʙi qadras nozil kardem! (Qur'onro)
Va tu ci doni, ki saʙi qadr cist
Saʙi qadr ʙehtar az hazor moh ast
Dar on saʙ faristagonu ruh ʙa farmoni Parvardigorason ʙaroi ancom dodani korho mefarojand
On saʙ to tulu'i ʙomdod hama salomu emini ast
Kofironi ahli kitoʙ va musrikon dast ʙarnadorand (az kufri xud), to ʙarojason xuccate ravsan ʙijojad —
pajomʙare az coniʙi Xudo, ki saxifahoi pokro mexonad
dar onho navistahoest rostu durust
Va ahli kitoʙ parokanda sudand, az on pas, ki ʙarojason ʙurhone ravsan omad
Va ononro faqat in farmon dodand, ki Xudoro ʙiparastand, dar hole ki dar dini U ixlos mevarzand. Va namoz guzorandu zakot dihand. In ast dini durustu rost
Az ahli kitoʙ onho, ki kofirand va, niz musrikon dar otasi cahannamand va dar on hamesa xohand ʙud. Inho ʙadtarini ofaridagonand
Kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista mekunand, ʙehtarini ofaridagonand
Muzdason dar nazdi Parvardigorason ʙihisthoest covid, ki dar on nahrho corist. To aʙad dar on cojand. Xudo az onho rozi ast va onho az Xudo roziand. Va in xosi kasest, ki az Parvardigoras ʙitarsad
On goh ki zamin larzonda savad ʙa saxttarin larzahojas
va zamin ʙorhoi sanginasro ʙerun rezad
va odami ʙigujad, ki zaminro ci rasidaast
Dar in ruz zamin xaʙarhoi xudro hikojat meku nad
az on ci Parvardigorat ʙa u vahj kardaast
Dar on ruz mardum parokanda az qaʙrho ʙerun meojand, to amalhojasonro ʙa onho nison dihand
Pas har kas ʙa vazni zarrae neki karda ʙosad, onro meʙinad
va har kas ʙa vazni zarrae ʙadi karda ʙosad, onro meʙinad
Savgand ʙa asponi tezdav
savgand ʙa aspone, ki ʙa sum az sang otas mecahonand
va savgand ʙa aspone, ki ʙomdodon hucum ovarand
va dar on co ƣuʙor ʙarxezonand
va dar on co dar mijon darojand
ki odami Parvardigori xudro sukr namegujad
va u xud ʙar in guvoh ast
U molro saxt dust dorad
Ojo namedonad, ki cun on ci dar gurhost, zinda gardad
va on ci dar dilho nihon ast, oskor savad
Parvardigorason dar on ruz az holason ogoh ast
Qori'ah
Cist qori'ah
va tu ci doni, ki qori'ah cist
Ruzest, ki mardum cun parvonagon parokanda ʙosand
va kuhho cun pasmi zadasuda
Ammo har ki pallai nekihoi tarozujas vaznin ʙosad
Pas u dar ajsi pisandida ʙosad
va ammo har ki saʙuk sud pallai nekihoi tarozujas
cojgohas dar hovijah ast
Va tu ci doni, ki hovijah cist
Otasest dar nihojati garmi
Ba ƣaflat kasid sumoro faxr kardan ʙa ʙisjorii molu farzand
to ʙa gurho rasided
Haqqo, ki ʙa zudi xohed donist
Boz ham haqqo, ki ʙa zudi xohed donist
Haqqo agar az rui jaqin ʙidoned
alʙatta, cahannamro xohed did
Sipas ʙa casmi jaqinas xohed did
sipas dar on ruz sumoro az ne'mathoi dunjavi ʙozxost mekunand
Savgand ʙa in zamon
ki odami dar zijon ast
ƣajri onho, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista kardand va jakdigarro ʙa haq suporis kardand va jakdigarro ʙa saʙr suporis kardand
Voj ʙar har ƣajʙatkunandai ajʙcue
on ki mole cam' kard va hisoʙi on nigah dost
Mepindorad, ki doroijas covidonas gardonad
Na cunin ast! ki Uro dar hutamah andozand
Va tu ci doni, ki hutamah cist
Otasi afruxtai Xudost
ki ʙar dilho ƣalaʙa mejoʙad
On otas az har su dar mijonason giriftaast
dar sutunhoi darozi otasi darovarda sudaast
Ojo nadidai, ki Parvardigorat ʙo ashoʙi fil ci kard
Ojo makrasonro ʙotil nasoxt
Va ʙar sari onho parrandagone sela - sela firistod
to onhoro ʙo siccil sangʙoron kardand
Va ononro cun kohi pasmonda dar oxur soxt
Baroi sukri ulfatu amni Qurajs
ulfatu amnason dar safari zimistonivu toʙistoni»
Pas ʙojad Parvardigori in xonaro (Ka'ʙaro) ʙiparastand
on ki ʙa hangomi gurusnagi ta'omason dod va az xavf dar amonason dost
Ojo onro, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ mesumurad, didi
U hamon kasest, ki jatimro ʙa ihonat (xori) meronad
va mardumro ʙa ta'om dodan ʙa ʙenavo tarƣiʙ namekunad
Pas voj ʙar on namozguzorone
ki dar namozi xud sahl angorand (dar ƣaflatand)
onon, ki rijo mekunand
va az dodani zakot sarkasi mekunand
Mo kavsarro ʙa tu ato kardem
Pas ʙaroi Parvardigorat namoz ʙixon va qurʙoni kun
ki ʙadxohi tu xud aʙtar ast
Bigu: «Ej kofiron
Man cizero, ki sumo meparasted, nameparastam
va sumo niz cizero, ki man meparastam, nameparasted
va man parastandai cize, ki sumo meparasted, nestam
va sumo parastandai cize, ki man meparastam, nested
Sumoro dini xud va maro dini xud!»
Cun jorii Xudovu piruzi ojad
va mardumro ʙuʙini, ki guruh-guruh ʙa dini Xudo medarojand
pas ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh guj va az U ʙaxsois ʙixoh, ki U tavʙapazir ast
Dasthoi Aʙulahaʙ ʙurida ʙod va halok ʙar u ʙod
Moli u va on ci ʙa dast ovarda ʙud, ʙa holas sud nakard
Ba zudi ʙa otase su'lavar darojad
va zanas hezumkas ast
va ʙar gardan resmone az lifi (pusti) xurmo dorad
Bigu: «Ust Xudoi jakto
Xudoe, ki dar hocat ʙa U ru kunand
na zoida ast va na zoida suda
va na hec kas hamtoi Ust!»
Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori suʙhgoh panoh meʙaram
az sarri on ci ʙijofaridaast
va az sarri saʙ cun darojad
va az sarri codugarone, ki dar girehho afsun medamand
va az sarri hasud cun hasad mekunad!»
Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori mardum panoh meʙaram
farmonravoi mardum
Xudoi mardum
az sarru vasvasagari pinhonsavanda
on ki dar dilhoi mardum vasvasa mekunad
xoh az cinnijon ʙosad jo az odamijon!»
